agent_utterance: Today’s quick, low-effort plan: 1) in the next hour, have a large glass of cold water (about 500–700 ml) and a small cooling snack (plain yogurt with berries or a small fruit cup). 2) log cravings and mood after this snack. 3) if a dessert craving arises later, try the 3-bite rule: savor only 3 bites and wait 10 minutes before deciding. 4) for a family dinner or cafe outing, pre-select a non-dessert option and keep your urge-kit handy. 5) when out with friends, order a beverage plus a small portion, and use a quick grounding exercise (4-3-2-1) if cravings surge. Stay cool and hydrated today.

A simple, low-effort plan that prioritizes hydration, a small cooling snack, and quick coping steps fits BED management and minimizes decision fatigue under environmental stress.
